TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Network extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用於與電腦所連接之網路互動的屬性、事件和方法。

span.span: Provides a property, event, and methods for interacting with the network to which the computer is connected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Network`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Network` object. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |上傳的檔案Upload a file|[如何：上傳檔案How to: Upload a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-upload-a-file.md)| |下載檔案Download a file|[如何：下載檔案How to: Download a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-download-a-file.md)| |請檢查連線狀態Check connection status|[如何：檢查連接狀態How to: Check Connection Status](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-check-connection-status.md)| ## Examples 此範例中將檔案上傳`Order.txt`至http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads. summary.span: 下載指定的遠端檔案，並儲存於指定的位置。

span.span: Downloads the specified remote file and saves it in the specified location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目的地檔案已經存在，`DownloadFile`方法不會覆寫現有的檔案。If the destination file already exists, the `DownloadFile` method will not overwrite the existing file. 您可以使用其中一個其他多載的方法，以指示它覆寫現有檔案，提供使用者認證，或指定特定的逾時值。You can use one of the other overloads of the method to instruct it to overwrite existing files, provide user credentials, or specify a specific timeout value. `DownloadFile` 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，輸出追蹤資訊。`DownloadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[啟用網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > `DownloadFile`方法不會傳送指定的 HTTP 標頭。The `DownloadFile` method does not send optional HTTP headers. 如果選擇性的使用者代理程式標頭遺失，某些伺服器可能會傳回 500 （內部伺服器錯誤）。Some servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the optional user agent header is missing. 若要傳送選擇性標頭，您必須建構要求使用類別。To send optional headers, you must construct a request using the class. 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile` method. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |下載檔案Download a file|[如何：下載檔案How to: Download a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-download-a-file.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會將檔案下載`WineList.txt`從`http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads`並將它儲存到`C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 這個範例會將檔案下載`WineList.txt`從`http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads`並將它儲存到`C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`，指定 500 毫秒的逾時間隔。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`, specifying a timeout interval of 500 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`showUI`設`True`，對話方塊會出現並顯示作業的進度; 此對話方塊包含**取消**可用來取消作業的按鈕。If `showUI` is set to `True`, a dialog box appears that shows the progress of the operation; the dialog box contains a **Cancel** button that can be used to cancel the operation. 對話方塊中不是強制回應，並因此不會封鎖使用者輸入其他程式中的視窗。The dialog box is not modal, and therefore does not block user input to other windows in the program. 如果伺服器沒有回應內指定`connectionTimeout`、 取消的作業，並擲回例外狀況。If the server does not respond within the specified `connectionTimeout`, the operation is cancelled, and an exception is thrown. `DownloadFile` 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，輸出追蹤資訊。`DownloadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[啟用網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > `DownloadFile`方法不會傳送指定的 HTTP 標頭。The `DownloadFile` method does not send optional HTTP headers. 如果選擇性的使用者代理程式標頭遺失，某些伺服器可能會傳回 500 （內部伺服器錯誤）。Some servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the optional user agent header is missing. 若要傳送選擇性標頭，您必須建構要求使用類別。To send optional headers, you must construct a request using the class. > [!NOTE] > FTP 通訊協定傳送的資訊，包括以純文字密碼，並不應該使用以傳輸機密資訊。The FTP protocol sends information, including passwords, in plain text and should not be used for transmitting sensitive information. 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile` method. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |下載檔案Download a file|[如何：下載檔案How to: Download a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-download-a-file.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會將檔案下載`WineList.txt`從`http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads`並將它儲存到`C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 這個範例會將檔案下載`WineList.txt`從`http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads`並將它儲存到`C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`，指定 500 毫秒的逾時間隔。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`, specifying a timeout interval of 500 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`showUI`設`True`，對話方塊會出現並顯示作業的進度; 此對話方塊包含**取消**可用來取消作業的按鈕。If `showUI` is set to `True`, a dialog box appears that shows the progress of the operation; the dialog box contains a **Cancel** button that can be used to cancel the operation. 對話方塊中不是強制回應，並因此不會封鎖使用者輸入其他程式中的視窗。The dialog box is not modal, and therefore does not block user input to other windows in the program. 如果伺服器沒有回應內指定`connectionTimeout`、 取消的作業，並擲回例外狀況。If the server does not respond within the specified `connectionTimeout`, the operation is cancelled, and an exception is thrown. `DownloadFile` 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，輸出追蹤資訊。`DownloadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[啟用網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > `DownloadFile`方法不會傳送指定的 HTTP 標頭。The `DownloadFile` method does not send optional HTTP headers. 如果選擇性的使用者代理程式標頭遺失，某些伺服器可能會傳回 500 （內部伺服器錯誤）。Some servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the optional user agent header is missing. 若要傳送選擇性標頭，您必須建構要求使用類別。To send optional headers, you must construct a request using the class. > [!NOTE] > FTP 通訊協定傳送的資訊，包括以純文字密碼，並不應該使用以傳輸機密資訊。The FTP protocol sends information, including passwords, in plain text and should not be used for transmitting sensitive information. 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile` method. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |下載檔案Download a file|[如何：下載檔案How to: Download a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-download-a-file.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會將檔案下載`WineList.txt`從`http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads`並將它儲存到`C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 這個範例會將檔案下載`WineList.txt`從`http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads`並將它儲存到`C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`，指定 500 毫秒的逾時間隔。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`, specifying a timeout interval of 500 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsAvailable` 一律傳回`False`從呼叫時`Click Once`應用程式，或如果使用者沒有。`IsAvailable` always returns `False` when called from a `Click Once` application or if the user does not have . 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Network.IsAvailable`屬性。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Network.IsAvailable` property. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |檢查電腦是否連接到網路Check whether a computer is connected to a network|[如何：檢查連接狀態How to: Check Connection Status](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-check-connection-status.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會檢查該屬性的狀態，並將它報告。This example checks the property's status and reports it. MemberSignature.Value: public event Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventHandler NetworkAvailabilityChanged;
.event class Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventHandler NetworkAvailabilityChanged
Public Custom Event NetworkAvailabilityChanged As NetworkAvailableEventHandler
public: event Microsoft::VisualBasic::Devices::NetworkAvailableEventHandler ^ NetworkAvailabilityChanged;

summary.span: 當網路可用性變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the network availability changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式引發`NetworkAvailabilityChanged`事件每次變更網路的可用性。An application raises the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event every time the availability of the network changes. 您可以使用屬性`e`參數，以取得新的網路連線狀態。You can use the property of the `e` parameter to get the new state of the network connection. 若要取得的網路連線的目前狀態，請使用屬性。To get the current state of the network connection, use the property. 在 Windows Form 應用程式中，會引發這個事件與其他使用者介面事件的應用程式的主執行緒上。In a Windows Forms application, this event is raised on the application's main thread with the other user-interface events. 這可讓應用程式的使用者介面直接存取此事件處理常式。This allows the event handler to access directly the application's user interface. 不過，如果應用程式忙碌處理另一個使用者介面事件時都會引發這個事件，此事件無法處理直到完成其他事件處理常式，或呼叫方法。However, if the application is busy handling another user-interface event when this event is raised, this event cannot be processed until the other event handler finishes or calls the method. 您無法使用`Handles`陳述式來處理`NetworkAvailabilityChanged`事件，您必須使用`AddHandler`陳述式。You cannot use the `Handles` statement to handle the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event; you must use the `AddHandler` statement. 在 Windows Forms 應用程式，`MyApplication`物件會公開`NetworkAvailabilityChanged`事件提供以相同的功能，為此事件，但您可以處理使用`Handles`陳述式。In Windows Forms applications, the `MyApplication` object exposes a `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event that provides the same functionality as this event, but you can handle it with the `Handles` statement. > [!NOTE] > 許多網路集線器提供網路連線，即使較大的網路連線中斷的中樞。Many network hubs provide a network connection, even if the hub is disconnected from a larger network. 因此，對於有線連線，此事件表示電腦與中心之間的連線中的變更。Consequently, for wired connections, this event indicates a change in the connection between the computer and a hub. > [!NOTE] > `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` Windows 95 及 Windows 98 執行的應用程式或由非系統管理員在 Windows 2000 執行的應用程式不會引發事件。The `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event is not raised by applications that run on Windows 95 and Windows 98 or by applications that are run on Windows 2000 by a non-administrator. 如果您的應用程式可能會在這些平台上執行，使用屬性。If your application might run on those platforms, use the property. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged`更新的表單或控制項的使用者介面的事件。This example uses the `My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event to update the user interface of a form or control. 此程式碼應該要在表單或控制項具有名為`Label1`。This code should to be in a form or control that has a named `Label1`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Ping`方法不是保全的方法，來判斷遠端電腦的可用性： 目標電腦上的 ping 通訊埠可能已關閉，或者防火牆或路由器已封鎖 ping 要求。The `Ping` method is not a fail-safe method for determining the availability of a remote computer: the ping port on the target computer may be turned off or the ping request may be blocked by a firewall or router. 位址傳遞至`Ping`方法必須為可解析的 DNS，並無法加上"http://"。The address passed to the `Ping` method must be DNS resolvable and cannot be preceded by "http://". ## Examples 這個範例會報告是否可以 ping 伺服器，判斷是否`Ping`方法會傳回`True`。This example reports whether or not the server can be pinged by determining whether the `Ping` method returns `True`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#4)] 取代`"198.01.01.01"`ping 伺服器 IP 位址、 URL 或電腦名稱。Replace `"198.01.01.01"` with the IP address, URL, or computer name of the server to ping. 這個範例會報告是否可以 ping 伺服器，判斷是否`Ping`方法會傳回`True`，並指定 1000年毫秒的逾時間隔。This example reports whether or not the server can be pinged by determining whether the `Ping` method returned `True` and specifies a timeout interval of 1000 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 取代`"www.cohowinery.com"`ping 伺服器 IP 位址、 URL 或電腦名稱。Replace `"www.cohowinery.com"` with the IP address, URL, or computer name of the server to ping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用其中一個其他多載的方法，以提供使用者認證，或指定特定的逾時值。You can use one of the other overloads of the method to provide user credentials or specify a specific timeout value. `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，輸出追蹤資訊。`My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[啟用網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md). 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Computer.Network.UploadFile`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` method. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |上傳的檔案Upload a file|[如何：上傳檔案How to: Upload a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-upload-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此範例中將檔案上傳`Order.txt`至`http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#2)] 這個範例會在未提供使用者名稱或密碼的情況下將 `Order.txt` 檔案上傳至 `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`、顯示上傳進度，並具有 500 毫秒的逾時間隔。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads` without supplying a user name or password, shows the progress of the upload, and has a time-out interval of 500 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用其中一個其他多載的方法，以指定特定的逾時值。You can use one of the other overloads of the method to specify a specific timeout value. `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，輸出追蹤資訊。`My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[啟用網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > FTP 通訊協定傳送的資訊，包括以純文字密碼，並不應該使用以傳輸機密資訊。The FTP protocol sends information, including passwords, in plain text and should not be used for transmitting sensitive information. 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Computer.Network.UploadFile`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` method. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |上傳的檔案Upload a file|[如何：上傳檔案How to: Upload a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-upload-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此範例中將檔案上傳`Order.txt`至`http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#2)] 這個範例會在未提供使用者名稱或密碼的情況下將 `Order.txt` 檔案上傳至 `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`、顯示上傳進度，並具有 500 毫秒的逾時間隔。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads` without supplying a user name or password, shows the progress of the upload, and has a time-out interval of 500 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`showUI`設`True`，對話方塊會顯示作業的進度，並包含**取消**使用者可以按一下以取消作業的按鈕。If `showUI` is set to `True`, a dialog box shows the progress of the operation and includes a **Cancel** button that the user can click to cancel the operation. 不強制回應對話方塊中，因為它不會封鎖使用者輸入其他程式中的視窗。Because the dialog box is not modal, it does not block user input to other windows in the program. 如果伺服器沒有回應中指定的間隔內`connectionTimeout`、 作業取消並擲回例外狀況。If the server does not respond within the interval specified in `connectionTimeout`, the operation is cancelled and an exception is thrown. `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，輸出追蹤資訊。`My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[啟用網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > FTP 通訊協定傳送的資訊，包括以純文字密碼，並不應該使用以傳輸機密資訊。The FTP protocol sends information, including passwords, in plain text and should not be used for transmitting sensitive information. 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Computer.Network.UploadFile`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` method. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |上傳的檔案Upload a file|[如何：上傳檔案How to: Upload a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-upload-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此範例中將檔案上傳`Order.txt`至`http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`showUI`設`True`，對話方塊會顯示作業的進度，並包含**取消**使用者可以按一下以取消作業的按鈕。If `showUI` is set to `True`, a dialog box shows the progress of the operation and includes a **Cancel** button that the user can click to cancel the operation. 不強制回應對話方塊中，因為它不會封鎖使用者輸入其他程式中的視窗。Because the dialog box is not modal, it does not block user input to other windows in the program. 如果伺服器沒有回應中指定的間隔內`connectionTimeout`、 作業取消並擲回例外狀況。If the server does not respond within the interval specified in `connectionTimeout`, the operation is cancelled and an exception is thrown. `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，輸出追蹤資訊。`My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[啟用網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > FTP 通訊協定傳送的資訊，包括以純文字密碼，並不應該使用以傳輸機密資訊。The FTP protocol sends information, including passwords, in plain text and should not be used for transmitting sensitive information. 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Computer.Network.UploadFile`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` method. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |上傳的檔案Upload a file|[如何：上傳檔案How to: Upload a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-upload-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此範例中將檔案上傳`Order.txt`至`http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#2)] 這個範例會在未提供使用者名稱或密碼的情況下將 `Order.txt` 檔案上傳至 `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`、顯示上傳進度，並具有 500 毫秒的逾時間隔。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads` without supplying a user name or password, shows the progress of the upload, and has a time-out interval of 500 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#3)]
